analytic.title: Adaptive choice of grid and time reinforcement learning

abstract.p: â€¢ In We propose local error estimates together with algorithms for adap-tive a-posteriori grid and time refinement in reinforcement learning. We consider a deterministic system with continuous state and time with infinite horizon discounted cost functional. For grid refinement we follow the procedure of numerical methods for the Bellman-equation. For time refinement we propose a new criterion, based on consistency estimates of discrete solutions of the Bellman-equation. We demonstrate, that an optimal ratio of time to space discretization is crucial for optimal learning rates and accuracy of the approximate optimal value function.
